item.title: What makes a function pure?
item.description: Everyone knows that naming things is hard. In fact, often it seems to be one of the hardest things in computer science and programming in general. In addition, sometimes a single word has multiple meanings, or worse - a term is explained in a variety of slightly differing definitions. One such term is a pure function.
